short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract Text from Images and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extract text from Images/PDFs.

Snap2Text transforms images and PDFs into editable text with a single click. Effortlessly extract content from visuals like screenshots, lecture slides, and scanned documents, and convert it into editable and searchable text.

Features:

Effortless Conversion: Extract text from images and PDFs seamlessly within your browser.

Edit and Search: Edit extracted text and make it searchable for easy information retrieval.

Translate: Translate the extracted text to your preferred language with just a click.
